availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nathaniel Nichols (Caldwell co. farmer (diff than the other Nat Nichols entity))

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary A. Blalock Nichols in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on February 9, 1850. Father of Caroline Nichols, William Nichols, James Nichols, Robert Nichols, and Martha Nichols. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Pollards Tan Yard in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 359A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Pollards Tan Yard, p. 151.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 276.
